text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Fox COULD have an actual NEWS man discussing important issues, like where were u besides your RALLIES and GOLFING IN THE EARLY MONTHS of COVID19!

YOU didn’t give it any thought then...when you FINALLY did, you make fun of it and GRIPED that DEMS we’re making a BIG DEAL...A HOAX!
